name: yellowbird6
description:
The award-winning product of the 2015 games++ game jam, inspired by the wifi password, yellowbird6.

Play as a purple-haired adventurer as she searches for the elusive Yellow Birds, with help from some wild friends. Each bird will give her a bonus that will help her explore, but only one will help at a time! Featuring colorful and detailed pixel art, a beautiful soundtrack, and simple but fun mechanics, this game is sure to frustrate you just the right amount, and keep you smiling the whole time.

The Team:

Jack Farzan - Concept & mechanics, art

Brian Intile (gman8r) - Programming

Adam Gincel - Sound
